article_title: Police arrest and jail dozens after State Capitol demonstration

article_metadata.description: A small group gathered outside the Fulton County Jail on Tuesday night to support dozens of people arrested at Georgia's state Capitol on Tuesday morning and afternoon.
article_metadata.author: EndPlay
